byline.contributor: Bill Vlasic contributed reporting from Detroit, Neal E. Boudette from Ann Arbor, Mich., and Diane Cardwell from New York.

lead_paragraph: The billionaire entrepreneur Elon Musk is running a private rocket company, doubling down on alternative fuels and pressing on with Tesla after a series of accidents.

headline.print_headline: Tesla’s Chief Sticks to Mission Despite a Series of Setbacks
headline.main: Elon Musk of Tesla Sticks to Mission Despite Setbacks

snippet: The billionaire entrepreneur Elon Musk is running a private rocket company, doubling down on alternative fuels and pressing on with Tesla after a series of accidents....
abstract: Tesla Motors chief executive Elon Musk is persisting with his vision of building clean-energy empire, despite setbacks with his company's electric cars; is planning to increase production of electric vehicles and will open huge new lithium-ion battery factory near Reno, Nev, as part of strategy for building less expensive car.
